## üìê Specs

- **Ratio**: 16:9 (1920x1080) or 3:1 (wide)
- **Character**: Left 1/3 of frame
- **Text Space**: Right 2/3 empty
- **Resolution**: 1920px width minimum

## üé® Gradients

- **Cream-Gold**: #FFFBF0 ‚Üí #F5E6D3
- **White-Peach-Gold**: #FFFFFF ‚Üí #FFE5D9 ‚Üí #FFD7BA
- **Blue-Cyan-White**: #E3F2FD ‚Üí #B3E5FC ‚Üí #FFFFFF
- **Pink-Cream-Yellow**: #FFF0F5 ‚Üí #FFF8E1
- **Lavender-Gold-White**: #F3E5F5 ‚Üí #FFE082 ‚Üí #FFFFFF
- **White-Champagne**: #FFFFFF ‚Üí #F7E7CE

## üí° Tips

- Right side stays simple for text overlay
- Generate multiple versions
- Test with dark and light text
